sqoop.arg: SELECT LkInvIsolatedReasonMSTID,InvIsolatedReasonID,MachineStageTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_LkInvIsolatedReasonMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionChain,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,FromDT,ToDT,DataEntryURI,SPCURI,AcquisitionImageURI,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Comments,Instructions,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,ToolTypeID,NoCavities,Documents,IsSuspendable,IsRotatableStepPlan,EBAReference,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionTypeID,ActionType,Description,ActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetLevelID,AssetID,SubAssetID,Sequence,Comments,FromDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetLevel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartID,ParentPartID,SubPartID,BOMItemID,SubPartQuantityTotal,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Lvl,SortOrder,SubPartQuantity,BOMVariantID,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsAllowExceedBOMQty, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CommonFaultID,CommonFault,Description,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,ToolTypeID,GaugeTypeID,PartTypeID,RfAssetTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CommonFault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CrnAdapterID,Length,ModifiedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CrnAdapter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentTypeID,DocumentType, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DocumentType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeID,Gauge,GaugeTypeID,DataDeviceID,SerialNo,SupplierID,DatePurchased, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Gauge WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvIsolatedReasonID,PartTypeID,IsolatedReason,InvStateID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvIsolatedReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineInfoID,ModifiedDT,IsOEEInventoryIsolation,IsOEEInventoryReintroduction,IsOEESpoilage,IsOEEDowntime,IsOEEInventoryProduction,NoBottlenecks,BottleneckMachineStageID,IsCountOutputInventory,IsCountInputInventory,IsOEEProductionUnits,LoginID,SessionID,PlantID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfoRecalc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartDefID,SPCChartSetViewID,Sequence,LkCDefInCViewID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCDefInCView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,RfCutByID,LkCutBySPCRuleID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCutBySPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,FaultID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkFaultMaintWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMaintProcPersonnelID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PersonnelID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMaintProcPersonnel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartAlternatePartID,AlternatePartID,PartID,PartToAlternatePartRatio, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartAlternatePart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkShiftMachineStageID,MachineStageID,ShiftID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKShiftMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolID,LkTTGID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineGroupID,MachineGroup,Description,IsRetired,RfMachineGroupTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopCategoryID,MachineStopCategory,Description,MachineStageTypeID,StopCategoryCode,DisplayOrder, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopCategory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenancePartUsedID,MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceProcedureResultID,PartID,Cost,DT,LoginID,Quantity,UnitID,InventoryPackID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartUsed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceReasonID,MaintenanceReason, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCConstantID,OPCItemID,Description,Constant,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCConstant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RfMachineStopRecordModeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationID,OperationTypeID,MachineStageID,JobID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Operation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PLCID,PLC,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PLC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseID,RootCause,Comments,RootCauseTypeID,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftSequenceID,ShiftPatternID,ShiftTypeID,Sequence,ShiftStartTime,ShiftEndTime, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftSequence WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCStatsStyleID,SPCStatsStyle,IsSystem, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCStatsStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListID,ListName,VariantNo, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagList WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagTreeNodeID,TagTreeNode,TagTreeID,ParentTagTreeNodeID,Depth,SortOrder,ImageURI,NoCols,NoRows,SortExpression,ImageWidth,ImageHeight, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,PartID,FromDT,ToDT,Downtime,Total_Time,Uptime, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Jobs_In_Shifts WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityStateReasonID,ToolTypeID,ToolCavityStateReason,Description,CavityStatusCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavityStateReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,StartUsingComments,ToolChangeComments,StartLoginID,ChangeLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedChangeDT,SavedStartDT,SavedChangeDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedToolUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeGroup,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementID,SpecID,MeasurementSetID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurement WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionProcedureID,WorkInstructionProcedure,WorkInstructionRef,PartID,IsEdited,FromDT,ToDT,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Location.LocationID, Location.Location, Location.LocationTypeID, Location.IsRetired, Location.MaxQuantity, Location.LocationCode, Location.Description, LocationType.LocationType, LocationType.LocationTypeCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM Location FULL JOIN LocationType ON (Location.LocationID = LocationType.LocationTypeID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
